# Government Tender Announcement

## Reference

* Reference Number: cb-204-20316920
* Solicitation Number: 01R11-24-C074
* Publication Date: January 10, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: February 19, 2024, 5:00 PM EST
* Amendment Date: February 19, 2024
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 29, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

## Tender Information

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
* Procurement Method: Selective Tendering Procedures
* Competitive Procurement Strategy: Mandatory Specifications and Price
* Trade Agreement: None
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Morden, Manitoba

## Request for Proposal (RFP)

Agriculture Agri-Food Canada invites pre-qualified suppliers to submit a proposal for the procurement of a Sample Grinder. The Successful bidder will be selected based on the mandatory technical criteria and the lowest aggregate price.

### Mandatory Technical Criteria

* The Sample Grinder must meet the specified technical requirements, including grinding jars, grinding balls, and an adapter for the Research and Development Center in Morden, Manitoba.

### Tender Requirements

* This RFP is reserved for holders of Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI only.
* Suppliers must be pre-qualified on the Supply Arrangement for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies.
* Suppliers may qualify under Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI at any time by downloading the solicitation document E60PV-19EQUI/D from CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba) and submitting a response.

### Contact Information

* Camille Sobczak, 204-430-5426, camille.sobczak@agr.gc.ca

### Important Notes

* Suppliers not holding a Supply Arrangement for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies will not be considered for contract award.
* The closing date and time for this RFP is February 19, 2024, 5:00 PM EST.
* The notice is published on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) for a period of 40 calendar days.

## Submission Guidelines

* Suppliers must submit their proposal electronically through CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba).
* The proposal must be submitted in accordance with the requirements set out in the solicitation documents
